channel.title: CVE Feed for miniorange -- LDAP Integration with Active Directory and OpenLDAP - NTLM & Kerberos Login
channel.description: The latest CVEs for miniorange -- LDAP Integration with Active Directory and OpenLDAP - NTLM & Kerberos Login

item.title: CVE-2023-23749|2024-08-04T08:42:48.211Z -- miniorange -- ldap%20integration%20with%20active%20directory%20and%20openldap%20-%20ntlm%20%26%20kerberos%20login
item.description: The 'LDAP Integration with Active Directory and OpenLDAP - NTLM & Kerberos Login' extension is vulnerable to LDAP Injection since is not properly sanitizing the 'username' POST parameter. An attacker can manipulate this paramter to dump arbitrary contents form the LDAP Database.
